Container.Name: MKVToolNix-gui
Container.Changes: [center][font size=5]MKVToolNix-gui Change Log[/font][/center][br] [font size=4]2015.07.26[/font][br] - Initial Release
Container.Description: MKVToolNix is a set of tools to create, alter and inspect Matroska files under Linux, other Unices and Windows.[br] Fill in the rdp and webgui ports you want in the Port section. Remember to NOT change the containerport![br] You can change the resolution in the Environment section to whatever you want. Add WIDTH and HEIGHT in the Environment Variables.[br] Default is WIDTH 1600, HEIGHT 1050.[br] I do nut use this program myself, so for help regarding the use of it, google is your friend.
Container.Overview: MKVToolNix is a set of tools to create, alter and inspect Matroska files under Linux, other Unices and Windows.
